archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1432
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer who has chosen to have a mix of billable and non-billable invoices, I want to be able to choose if a non-billed invoice is sent as info only e.g. Wn receives an info only invoice but all services are for by Chch

properties.value: What is meant by non-billable invoice? its the statement. copy of the invoice (different header - statement only). PDF/CSV If anything is expected for Wn (report?) Eddie excample of statement. Additional use case will be provided by Jared

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
